adminAnalytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
adminAnalytics.subtitle: System performance and usage analytics
adminAnalytics.scoresExplained: How are scores and averages computed?
adminAnalytics.chapterLogic1: Chapter analytics aggregate data from all students' quiz attempts, assignments, and progress for that specific chapter.
adminAnalytics.chapterLogic2: Average scores are calculated using students' best attempts per quiz to provide accurate performance representation.
adminAnalytics.chapterLogic3: Completion rates are based on students who have attempted at least 10 questions in the chapter.
adminAnalytics.weakAreasLogic1: Weak areas are identified using Bloom's taxonomy analysis when class average falls below 60% in specific cognitive levels.
adminAnalytics.weakAreasLogic2: The system tracks Remember, Understand, Apply, Analyze, Evaluate, and Create levels across all student responses.
adminAnalytics.scoresLogic1: All scores are percentage-based and weighted by question difficulty and cognitive complexity.
adminAnalytics.scoresLogic2: Badge colors indicate performance levels: green (‚â•70%), default/blue (60-69%), secondary/gray (<60%).

aiChat.title: AI Study Assistant
aiChat.subtitle: Get intelligent answers about your course materials
aiChat.selectChapterDescription: Choose a chapter to get more accurate and relevant answers
aiChat.assistantCapabilities: What can the AI Assistant do?
aiChat.capability1: Answer questions about course materials using intelligent multi-step retrieval
aiChat.capability2: Provide step-by-step reasoning to help you understand concepts better
aiChat.capability3: Perform calculations (like Ohm's Law) and show the working
aiChat.capability4: Cite sources from your uploaded materials so you can verify information
aiChat.capability5: Remember conversation context for follow-up questions

login.features: ‚ú® AI-powered study tools ‚Ä¢ üìä Progress tracking ‚Ä¢ ü§ñ Personalized learning

feedback.personalizedFromTeachers: Personalized feedback from your teachers to help you improve
feedback.noFeedbackMessage: Your teachers haven't generated any feedback for you yet. Keep up the good work in your studies!
feedback.improvementLogic1: Areas for improvement are identified when your performance falls below 60% in specific skill areas (Bloom's taxonomy levels).
feedback.improvementLogic2: The AI analyzes your quiz and assignment scores across Remember, Understand, Apply, Analyze, Evaluate, and Create levels.
feedback.improvementLogic3: When you consistently score low in a particular cognitive level, it suggests focused practice in that area.
feedback.recommendationLogic1: Recommendations are generated based on your learning patterns and performance gaps.
feedback.recommendationLogic2: The AI considers your strongest and weakest areas to suggest personalized study paths.
feedback.recommendationLogic3: Recommendations prioritize urgent needs (scores <40%) as high priority and moderate needs (40-60%) as medium priority.
feedback.bloomLogic1: Bloom's Taxonomy categorizes learning into six cognitive levels, from basic recall to creative synthesis.
feedback.bloomLogic2: Our AI tracks your performance at each level to provide targeted feedback:
feedback.rememberLevel: Basic recall of facts and concepts
